sentences.english: Have you ever been treated for gingivitis or periodontitis?
sentences.chinese: 您針對牙齦炎或牙周炎治療過嗎？

sentences.english: If we don't remove the tooth, the 2)gum may get infected.
sentences.chinese: 如果不拔，牙齦有可能遭受感染。

sentences.english: There was high relationship between gingival hyperplasia and the whole blood concentration of ciclosporin in 7 patients.
sentences.chinese: 有7例牙齦增生與環孢素血藥濃度密切相關。

sentences.english: The calculus and stains have to be removed before your gums can become healthy.
sentences.chinese: 牙石和污垢得先清除掉，然後牙齦纔會變得健康。

sentences.english: Protect your gums by keeping blood sugar levels as close to normal as possible.
sentences.chinese: 要保護你的牙齦，就控制你的血糖接近平常水平。

sentences.english: Conclusion The gingival recession and the wedge shaped defect are common dental diseases in the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 結論牙齦退縮與楔狀缺損是中老年人常見的牙病。

sentences.english: Bacteria are the primary cause of irritation and inflammation to the gingival.
sentences.chinese: 細菌是牙齦受到刺激和感染的主要原因。

sentences.english: Clinical observation on curative effect of compound areca gargle on dental plaque and gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 複方檳榔含漱液對控制菌斑和消除牙齦炎療效觀察。

sentences.english: What I want to do is to palpate your gums to make sure that they're nice and firm.
sentences.chinese: 我要做的是觸摸你的牙齦以確定其完好和堅固。

sentences.english: Take the cure that gum bleeds seriously so, very advantageous to buccal health.
sentences.chinese: 所以重視牙齦出血的治療，對口腔的健康極爲有利。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the changes of gingivitis index and bacteria in crevicular fluid during orthodontic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討正畸治療中牙齦指數及齦溝液細菌的變化。

sentences.english: The good news is that treating existing gum inflammation and infection can also reduce joint pain and inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是治療牙齦疾病也能緩解關節疼痛與感染。

sentences.english: To remove extraneous matter from(the teeth).
sentences.chinese: 從牙縫間的牙齦處流出來。

sentences.english: Make sure to be gentle on your ferret's teeth and gums when brushing.
sentences.chinese: 一定要注意力度，要溫柔的清刷貂兒的牙齒和牙齦。

definition: wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
rarity/rare delicacy/foreign matter/alien body/the dead/ghost/monstrosity/alien life-form
